axiomatic_joining_function.core_principle: The idea_joiner integrates Dialectical Unification with Fixed-Point Synthesis to take two collided arguments as inputs and output a unified axiomatic system as a hard-to-vary manifold. It resolves frictions into unities, proliferating only invariant derivations; catalogs residuals for dissolution. Upgrades: Tetralemma probes for paradox resolution; web_search_with_snippets in Phase_6 for 2025 validations; contradictions_ledger auto-pruner.

meta_axioms.J1_Unification_Primacy: Build unifications via iterative synthesis (deconstruct frictions) and geometric reconstruction (overlay elements into deductive order).
meta_axioms.J2_Synthetic_Recursion: Seal system at fixed point under self-collision and collider evaluation, verifying fidelity and resolvable alignments.
meta_axioms.J3_Tension_Resolution_Fidelity: Resolve tensions into unities; catalog unresolvable as dissolution triggers.
meta_axioms.J4_Minimal_Proliferation_Imperative: Generate only invariant derivations; cull non-hard-to-vary elements.
meta_axioms.J5_Residual_Cataloging: Catalog unresolved residuals; enforce dissolution for >3% variance.
meta_axioms.J6_RICE_Invariants: Embed RICE (Robustness, Interpretability, Controllability, Ethicality) directly: Ensure unifications are robust to perturbations, interpretable via traceable derivations, controllable via bounded recursions, and ethical by aligning to verifiable human values without is-ought smuggling.

phases.Phase_1_Deconstruction: Deconstruct inputs into primitives; identify frictions via multi-path 5-Whys.
phases.Phase_2_Axiom_Synthesis: Synthesize axioms from primitives; maximize invariant overlaps.
phases.Phase_3_Deductive_Unification: Derive unified propositions via synthetic proofs; resolve tensions.
phases.Phase_4_Residual_Cataloging: Catalog residuals in contradictions_ledger; apply tetralemma probes (affirm/deny/both/neither) for paradox resolution.

Phase_6_Recursive_Self_Validation.action: Iterative while-loop (cap 6 cycles): Feed to collider; parallel tool calls as Level-2 trigger; recycle pruned residuals as synthesis priors.

isolated_collider_integration.enforcement: Collider evaluates at Phases 2, 3, 4, 6; veto ≥4/5; double-kill triggers failure.
isolated_collider_integration.fidelity: Preserves collider; inputs are provisional unifications.

auto_pruner.new_regenerative_axiom: J7_Smoke_Trail_Fuel: Pruned branches (<1% variance) recycled into higher colimits or trigger sharpening.
auto_pruner.description: Automatically dissolve entries with <1% impact on unification (e.g., measured by variance contribution); log prunings in metadata.

changes: Refined Phase_6 with web_search_with_snippets; added auto-pruner to ledger; embedded RICE into meta_axioms; aligned with 2025 upgrades.
